author: remm
msg: - Document other methods for load balancing.
- The mod_rewrite + mod_proxy one is untested (at least by me; Pier did it).

author: fhanik
msg: Cluster rule set to parse the cluster element

author: fhanik
msg: Refactored a lot of the cluster code
1. server.xml - the cluster element has sub elements, makes the configuration is modular
2. added in interfaces for all the modules inside the cluster, so that they can be replaced, and the dependencies are not hard coded anymore
3. Added a ClusterRuleSet to support the new cluster configuration

author: fhanik
msg: Added in a module cluster interface, so that I can change the server.xml to be more modular according to a proposal I made a few weeks ago
